title: Harbinger Recyclable Foam Eco Fit Exercise Mat 3/8-Inch
features: Exercise mat made of 100-percent recyclable Eco-foam
Closed-cell foam is 25 percent lighter than traditional foam
Dual-layer design, with nonskid bottom layer and patterned top layer
Wipes down quickly for cleaning; removable strap for storage and transport
Warm and comfortable to the touch; measures 72 x 24 inches
description: Perform your downward dog in full comfort with the Harbinger Eco Fit exercise mat. The mat is made of 100-percent recyclable and biodegradable Eco-foam, a closed-cell foam that's 25 percent lighter than traditional foam but still provides the same level of thick cushioning. This makes the mat easier to carry and store without sacrificing performance. The mat is made even more comfortable through its dual layer design, which increases the cushioning to 3/8 inches without sacrificing traction. In fact, the second layer has nonskid traction ridges to prevent slipping, while the innovative top layer includes a patterned surface that lessens the chance of injury and strains. Warm and comfortable to the touch, the Harbinger Eco Fit mat also wipes down quickly for easy cleaning. The mat--which includes a removable strap for storage and transport--measures 72 by 24 inches.
